text: Berlin Recycling Volleys is a German sports club (SCC Berlin) founded in 1991 and based in Berlin, Germany. The Berlin Recycling men's volleyball team plays in the Bundesliga and the CEV Champions League. The team won seven titles in Deutsche Bundesliga. ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:1991 establishments in Germany Category:Volleyball clubs established in 1991 Category:German volleyball clubs Category:Sport in Berlin Category:Organisations based in Berlin
title: Berlin Recycling Volleys
